actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution designating the second week of November, 1983 as "National Congregate and Meals on Wheels Week".

summary.text: Designates the week beginning November 6, 1983, as National Congregate and Meals on Wheels Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution designating the second week of November, 1983 as "National Congregate and Meals on Wheels Week".
